fields.name: Custom Web Development
fields.short_description: Modern, responsive websites built with cutting-edge technologies like React, Django, and TypeScript.
fields.description: I create custom websites tailored to your business needs using modern technologies. From simple landing pages to complex web applications, I ensure your site is fast, secure, and user-friendly.
fields.features:
Custom responsive design
React & TypeScript frontend
Django REST API backend
Database design & integration
SEO optimization
Performance optimization
Cross-browser compatibility
Mobile-first approach

fields.name: Website Maintenance
fields.short_description: Keep your website running smoothly with regular updates, security patches, and performance monitoring.
fields.description: Ongoing maintenance ensures your website stays secure, fast, and up-to-date. I provide comprehensive maintenance packages to keep your site running at peak performance.
fields.features:
Security updates & patches
Regular backups
Performance monitoring
Content updates
Bug fixes & troubleshooting
Uptime monitoring
Technical support
Monthly reports

fields.name: Performance Optimization
fields.short_description: Speed up your existing website with advanced optimization techniques and modern best practices.
fields.description: Slow websites lose customers. I analyze and optimize your existing site to improve loading times, user experience, and search engine rankings.
fields.features:
Speed analysis & audit
Image optimization
Code minification
Database optimization
Caching implementation
CDN setup
Core Web Vitals improvement
Google PageSpeed optimization

fields.name: Technical Consultation
fields.short_description: Expert advice on technology stack, architecture decisions, and development best practices.
fields.description: Get professional guidance on your web development projects. I help you make informed decisions about technology choices, project planning, and implementation strategies.
fields.features:
Technology stack recommendations
Architecture planning
Code review & audit
Project planning & estimation
Best practices guidance
Security assessment
Scalability planning
Ongoing mentorship
